pages.text: To produce steel, create a $(item)Primitive Blast Furnace/$ or four. You'll need 33 $(item)Firebricks/$ for the first one.$(p)If you wall-share on one side, you need 21 Firebricks. On two sides, 13. A square of four PBFs would need 88 total. A line of four is 96.

A $(item)steam macerator/$ and $(item)steam compressor/$ are necessary to create the component bricks.$(p)Once you have steel, look into upgrading your boilers and steam machines for more steam production and faster processing.
The Primitive Blast Furnace can also be used to convert basic ores into blooms instead of needing to manage a bloomery. A $(item)Trip Hammer/$ can automate the hammering of blooms into items.
